ARABIC: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: that will neither nourish nor satisfy their hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: which will neither fatten them nor satisfy them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Which neither give strength nor satisfy the hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Which will neither nourish nor avail against hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Which will neither fatten nor avail against hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Which doth not nourish nor release from hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: which will neither nourish nor satisfy hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Which shall neither nourish nor avail against hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: neither nourishing, nor of avail against hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Which will neither nourish nor satisfy hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Which will neither nourish nor avail against hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: which neither sustains, nor satisfy hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That neither nourishes, nor satisfies hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [88:7]   neither nourishing, nor availing against hunger.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Which doth not nourish nor release from hunger) when one eats it.
